short_summary: The Department of National Defence is seeking a contractor to provide snow removal services for Canadian Armed Forces (CAF) parking lots.
description: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and Buyandsell posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted at the latest by 2 PM EDT on September 15, 2022 (13-09-2022).. All bids submitted after 2 PM EDT will result in the bid being declared non-responsive.
full_summary:
================================

**Tender for Snow Removal Services at Canadian Forces Base Bagotville**

**Reference Number:** WS3591052167
**Transaction Name:** W0138-22A012
**Publication Date:** August 26, 2022
**Closing Date:** September 15, 2022 at 14:00 EDT

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of the Department of National Defence (DND) invites qualified contractors to submit a proposal for the provision of snow removal services for Canadian Armed Forces parking lots at Canadian Forces Base (CFB) Bagotville, Québec, Canada.

**Service Requirements:**

* Clearing of parking lots
* Snow removal
* Ice removal

The contractor will be responsible for providing the necessary equipment, personnel, and expertise to perform the services as outlined in Section 7 of the SOLICITATION DOCUMENT.

**Evaluation Criteria:**

The proposal will be evaluated based on the lowest price.

**Eligibility:**

* Contractors must be registered on Buyandsell.sgc.ca
* Contractors must have the required expertise and resources to perform the services.

**Supporting Documentation:**

* Bid submission must be submitted electronically through Buyandsell.sgc.ca
* All supporting documentation must be submitted at the latest by 14:00 EDT on September 15, 2022.

**Notice URL:**

* http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/13930230?extsite=MTM5MzAyMzBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

**Contact Information:**

* Julien Ratte, Contracting Authority
* Email: [julien.ratte@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:julien.ratte@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

Please note that this tender is subject to the Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement, Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA), Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement, World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), Canada-Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement, and Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement.
